simplified: 花有重开日，人无再少年

pronunciation.pinyin: huā yǒu chóng kāi rì , rén wú zài shào nián
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: hua1 you3 chong2 kai1 ri4 , ren2 wu2 zai4 shao4 nian2

details.simplified: 花有重开日，人无再少年
details.traditional: 花有重開日，人無再少年

meanings.value: a flower may blossom again, but a person cannot get young again (proverb)
